StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [DeleteSemesterInfo]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ID int
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
--IMPORTANT NOTE: Add begin and end transac.on
IF EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[PooleeSemesterInfo] si where ID = @ID and @ID > 0)
BEGIN
DELETE [MCRISS].[USMC].[PooleeSemesterInfo] WHERE ID = @ID
END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
